attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: GIVE JOSEPH WHEATER, LINCOLNSHIRE AN AWARD FOR BEING ONE OF THE OLDEST SURVIVING OLYMPIC PARTICIPANTS.  HE IS CURRENTLY 92 YEARS OF AGE AND IS A SHOOTER OF LONG STANDING

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
